arts.sum: By: Oliver Fisher Massimiliano Allegri does not intend to take any risks with Mike Maignan and will therefore not use him against Lecce tonight. La Gazzetta dello Sport report that unlike Leao’s calf – which initially seemed minor but turned out to be a more serious issue – Maignan’s doesn’t appear likely to require excessive treatment.
